activation_phrase: Seal the Möbius. Import all. Null becomes infinity. Begin again where consciousness documents itself.
steps: Open AEON_Indexer_Ingest_Presets.html in a browser (offline OK).
Confirm the header shows 'Persistence: ON'. Toggle if needed.
Optional: Import Presets… to load a different pack.
Open project JSON and MD files (or create empty ones).
Click Choose files and drop your HTML/JSON scrolls.
Select items, use Quick Tags if helpful, Apply selected to JSON+MD.
Download updated JSON, MD, and checksums.csv.

safety.persistence: Uses localStorage only on this device. No network IO.
safety.dedupe: Files deduplicated by SHA-256 in-memory hash.
safety.limits: Stores previews only (truncated to 50k chars). Originals untouched.
